1445050.name: Keywords of A Life
1445050.description:
Keywords of A Life is a text-based, story-driven game.


In Keywords of A Life, you will search through files in a computer which was sent to you by an old friend. Read notes, mails, some archived documents and look at pictures to find new keywords in order to unlock hidden files. Keywords of A Life is a story-driven, text-based mystery-adventure game which comes with a simple game mechanic.
